text: we leveraged IDR incident detection
responses which really helped us handle
AWS incidents on time and keeping our
customers up to date with where we are
at and when the incident is going to get
resolved By using incident detection and
response we have cut down our case
resolution process by 50% on business
critical issues by our customers Our
customers run most critical contact
center operations on Salesforce platform
by using powerful features available on
Salesforce like omni channel We have
seen multiple benefits using AWS
enterprise support We can chat with the
AWS support engineers and also we can
use the escalation management via pager
alerts AWS support engineers are always
ready to hop on a call with us when we
see any complex issues A set of people
work on AWS incidents to resolve them
quickly and also AWS has SLO of 5
minutes on this ADR
